synflood module

synflood.generate_packet(target_ip)[source]

Generate a TCP SYN packet with specified destination IP.

Parameters:

target_ip (str) – The destination IP address for the packet.

Returns:

The generated packet.

Return type:

scapy.Packet

synflood.send_packets(target_ip, num_packets, num_threads)[source]

Send packets to a target IP using multiple threads.

Parameters:

  • target_ip (str) – The target IP address to send packets to.

  • num_packets (int) – The number of packets to send per thread.

  • num_threads (int) – The number of threads to use.

synflood.send_packets_thread(target_ip, num_packets)[source]

Send a specified number of packets to a target IP in a separate thread.

Parameters:

  • target_ip (str) – The target IP address to send packets to.

  • num_packets (int) – The number of packets to send.

synflood.signal_handler(sig, frame)[source]

Handle KeyboardInterrupt signal.

Parameters:

  • sig (int) – The signal number.

  • frame (frame object) – The current stack frame.
